verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When Judas had gone Jesus said: ‘Now has the Son of Man been glorified,
and in him God has been glorified. If God has been glorified in him,
God will in turn glorify him in himself, and will glorify him very soon.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
‘My little children, I shall not be with you much longer.
I give you a new commandment:love one another;
just as I have loved you,you also must love one another.
By this love you have for one another,
everyone will know that you are my disciples.’
